name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070 Ti
description: Sweet spot Blackwell GPU with 12GB GDDR7 memory. Delivers RTX 4090-class performance at a fraction of the price with full ray tracing and DLSS 4.0 support.

reviews.review_text: 4090 performance for under 800 bucks. Incredible value.
Wish it had 16GB but 12GB handles everything I play.
